sentences.english: The fish then went to work, nibbling away.
sentences.chinese: 然后鱼去工作，一点一点地轻咬脚趾和小腿。

sentences.english: You are only nibbling your food。
sentences.chinese: 你只是在轻咬你的食物。

sentences.english: Little fish nibbled at her arms and legs. She closed her eyes and floated.
sentences.chinese: 小鱼轻咬着她的手脚，她闭上眼睛漂浮着。

sentences.english: Tender bite and touch made him paralytic and brought him on fire.
sentences.chinese: 温柔的轻咬和触摸让他感到麻痹，身体仿佛着了火。

sentences.english: I climbed into the bath and I could feel the eels nibbling my body.
sentences.chinese: 我爬进浴池，能感觉到一群黄鳝在轻咬我的身体。

sentences.english: Now all you gotta do is nibble on this little bitch's earlobe..
sentences.chinese: 轻咬那小妞的耳垂就是你唯一需要做的事。

sentences.english: Aren't you hungry？You are only nibbling your food.
sentences.chinese: 你不饿吗？你只是在轻咬你的食物。

sentences.english: Gently suck or nibble on their lips here and there.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地温柔地吮吸或者轻咬对方的嘴唇。

sentences.english: From his seat at the bar, the dog licks my finger, nibbling gently at the tip.
sentences.chinese: 小狗窝在它主人怀里，舔我的手指，轻咬我的指尖。

sentences.english: I could feel fish nibbling at the bait .
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到有鱼在轻咬鱼饵。

sentences.english: It tasted sweet and clean, like taking a bite of the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 它的味道清甜，就像轻咬了海洋一口。

sentences.english: If your puppy has a tendency to nibble on grass, don't be alarmed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的小狗有在草地上轻咬的倾向，不要惊慌。

definition: to open and close (the mouth etc)
